text: hi i'm amit gupta a solutions architect
for amazon connect amazon connect lets
you provide superior customer service at
a lower cost with an easy to use omni
channel cloud contact center
today many businesses are constrained by
legacy contact center technologies that
only allow inbound communication and
rely on separate applications and tools
to reach customers with outbound
communications
integrating third-party tools for
outbound communications into contact
center is time consuming expensive and
difficult to manage because each
outbound communication channel such as
calls text or emails require separate
application resulting in a solution that
lacks flexibility and is difficult to
scale to high volumes
amazon pinpoint is a flexible and
scalable outbound and inbound marketing
communication service amazon connect and
amazon pinpoint come together to offer
organizations a simple embedded
cost-effective way to contact millions
of customers daily for communications
like marketing promotions appointment
reminders and upcoming delivery
notifications without having to
integrate third party tools
in this short video i'm going to show
you how you can easily create an
outbound campaign to communicate with
your customers using amazon connect and
amazon pinpoint let's dive in our
customers tell us that their agents
spend a lot of time listening to
answering machines or busy signals on
outbound calls the omnichannel outbound
communications capability of amazon
connect includes a machine
learning-powered answering machine
detection to distinguish between a live
customer voicemail greeting or busy
signal to increase agent efficiency by
only connecting agents to a live
customer
imagine you are a business trying to
reach thousands of customers with a
reminder about their upcoming
reservation or service appointment and
you want to give an option to talk to an
agent only if the customer answers the
call
here i'm logged into amazon connect
console i will use the menu bar on the
left to navigate to contact flows
as we are planning to run an outbound
campaign with answering machine
detection let me first show you the
contact flow where we will perform
answering machine detection
here i have already created a hvoc demo
contact flow with call progress analysis
block this will help us detect if the
outbound call is answered by a live
customer or an answering machine or a
voicemail
as you can see in this contact flow if
the call is answered by a live customer
amazon connect will play a message
about the upcoming reservation from the
customer to press one to confirm or two
to talk with an agent if customer
presses two
they will get connected to an agent
next
let me show you how an outbound campaign
is created in amazon connect i will be
referencing high volume outbound
communications as hvoc going forward we
will have a hvoc demo campaign
configured in amazon connect as you can
see there are three parts to this
configuration the first one is the name
of the campaign the second is the
outbound configuration where you specify
which outbound contact flow that need to
be triggered and then which is the queue
where you will find an available agent
the phone number for hvoc is also
configured here
and now the third section in the
outbound dialer configuration where you
can specify whether you want to run a
predictive or a progressive campaign
in predictive mode pacing of calls is
based on predicted agent availability in
near real-time statistics
you will use this mode for campaigns
where maximizing agent time is the most
important metric for the business
in progressive mode amazon connect does
not dial until the agent becomes
available you will use this mode when
reaching customers is more important
than optimizing asian talk time
you can also set the bandwidth
allocation to specify a percentage of
agents available in the queue that will
be considered for a particular campaign
at the time of dialogue
now let's look at amazon pinpoint
console where we create the journey and
run the campaigns from
let's select the amazon connect outbound
dialog project which i have already
created
on the left you can see the segments a
segment is a group of your customers
that share certain attributes we will
create a new segment and import the
customer phone numbers we extracted from
a crm application such as salesforce
servicenow etc
here is a sample csv file with customer
phone numbers and other attributes which
i am importing to create a segment
for this scenario i will have my
customers in the same segment as i'm
trying to reach out to them to confirm
their upcoming reservation now we will
go to the journey journey is a way to
define and create engagement experience
i will duplicate one of the journeys
that i had created earlier i will then
specify the segment i created earlier
and also specify which amazon connect
campaign to use with the journey you
also need to specify a role so that
amazon pinpoint has access to the amazon
connect campaign we created earlier
once you have the journey configured it
is time to run it let's click on
settings select the time zone start and
end time for the journey all these steps
can be automated so that you do not need
to manually start the journey
let's mark the journey as reviewed and
publish it
i'm also playing a customer here so i
will get a phone call
let me answer it
and i say hello
here i have an agent logged in and
available to take calls as the outbound
call was answered by a live customer who
also chose the option to talk with an
agent the outbound call placed to the
customer is delivered to this agent
if the outbound call is not answered by
a live customer you can specify in the
contact flow if you want to leave a
voicemail if the call is answered by
your voicemail or if you want to retry
calling the customer later or reach out
to the customer on other channels such
as text and email based on their
communication preferences
so to recap you saw how you can set up
outbound campaigns for your contact
center in minutes using hvoc and scale
instantly to support
millions of customers with an improved
customer experience it also simplifies
your contact center operations
improves your agent efficiency and
lowers your costs i hope you enjoyed
this demo for more information about
amazon connect please visit aws.com
connect thank you
